title: China Trade Talks Extended, Trump/Kim Summit Preview
itunes:title: China Trade Talks Extended, Trump/Kim Summit Preview
description:
Kevin Cirilli discusses the extension of US/China trade negotiations and a preview of the second summit next week between North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and President Trump with guests Andrew Bishop, Partner & Global Head of Policy Research at Signum Global Advisors and Norm Roule, Former CIA intelligence officer who has managed numerous programs relating to Iran and the Middle East.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
